Retrieved 2012-3-2. ==History== The team was founded in 1935. *1935-1979 Toshiba Horikawa SC *1980-1995 Toshiba SC *1996-2015 Consadole Sapporo *2016-present Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo ==League title== *Japan Soccer League Division 2 : 2 **1979, 1988/89 *Japan Football League : 1 **1997 *J2 League : 2 **2000, 2007 ==League position== *2011 : J2 League - 3rd *2012 : J1 League - 18th *2013 : J2 League - 8th *2014 : J2 League - 10th *2015 : J2 League - 10th *2016 : J2 League - 1st *2017 : J1 League - 11th *2018 : J1 League - 4th *2019 : J1 League - 10th *2020 : J1 League - 12th ===Former position=== ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo players == References == ==Other websites== * Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo website * J.League Club Guide Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Sapporo Category:1935 establishments in Japan
